CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 1, 1947, pg. 10 reads: "Achievement Club Delegates - Delegates attending the second annual convention of the National Achievement Club's, Inc., last week, are pictured on the steps of the Grace Memorial Presbyterian Church. Mrs. Alma Illery, founder and president, is seen in first row. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Achievement Club delegates, including Alma Illery in center, standing on steps of Grace Memorial Presbyterian Church for second annual convention
